long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üöÄ New Features in v1.5 (Dec 2024)
-Added Copy & Export buttons for each bookmark
-Quickly copy bookmark content to clipboard
-Export individual bookmarks as text files for easy sharing
-New toolbar notification badge
--Shows "NEW" indicator when extension updates
-Helps you stay informed about the latest features
-Interactive Tutorial for New Users

ThinkGPT: Your Personal ChatGPT Bookmark Manager

Save and organize your most valuable ChatGPT conversations with just one click. Instantly return to any saved message, copy important responses, or export them for later use. Features a clean, intuitive interface with both light and dark modes, making it perfect for day or night use. Search through your bookmarks easily and never lose an important ChatGPT insight again. Simple, fast, and designed to enhance your ChatGPT experience.
__________________________
 Never lose track of valuable insights or important conversations again!
Key Features:
üîñ Easy Bookmarking: With a single click, save any message from your ChatGPT conversations.
üöÄ Quick Access: Instantly revisit your bookmarked content whenever you need it.
üîç Smart Search: Quickly find specific bookmarks using our powerful search functionality.
üóÇÔ∏è Efficient Organization: Keep your most valuable ChatGPT insights at your fingertips.
üîÄ Seamless Integration: Works smoothly within the ChatGPT interface for a natural user experience.
üîí Privacy-Focused: All your bookmarks are stored locally on your device, ensuring your data remains private.
Perfect for:

Software Developers saving code snippets, debugging tips, and architecture discussions
Students capturing and retrieving study materials and explanations
Researchers saving and searching through valuable insights and data points
Professionals organizing and quickly accessing project-related information
Writers collecting and finding ideas and inspirations
Anyone who wants to make the most of their ChatGPT conversations!

How It Works:

Install ThinkGPT and navigate to chat.openai.com
As you chat, click the bookmark icon next to any message you want to save
Access your bookmarks anytime through the ThinkGPT extension popup
Use the smart search feature to quickly find specific bookmarks by keywords or topics
Easily jump back to any bookmarked conversation with a single click

Boost your productivity, streamline your research, and never lose an important ChatGPT message again. Let ThinkGPT be your personal ChatGPT librarian, helping you capture, search, and retrieve the knowledge you need, when you need it.
Smart Search in Action:

Instantly filter through your bookmarks to find exactly what you're looking for
Search by keywords, phrases, or topics to quickly locate specific information
Save time by efficiently managing and accessing your growing collection of ChatGPT insights
Developers can quickly retrieve bookmarked code solutions, API usage examples, or algorithm explanations
